description: The breadthfirst layout puts nodes in a hierarchy, based on a breadthfirst traversal of the graph

animate.description: Whether to transition the node positions

animationDuration.description: Duration of animation in ms if enabled

animationEasing.description: Easing of animation if enabled. For possible values see `transition-timing-function` at [easing](http://js.cytoscape.org/#style/transition-animation)

avoidOverlap.description: Prevents node overlap, may overflow bounding-box and radius if not enough space

circle.description: Put depths in concentric circles if true, put depths top down if false

directed.description: Whether the tree is directed downwards (or edges can point in any direction if false)

fit.description: Whether to fit the viewport to the graph

maximalAdjustments.description: How many times to try to position the nodes in a maximal way (i.e. no backtracking)

padding.description: The padding on fit in pixels

roots.description: Array of full IRIs that should be treated as tree roots

spacingFactor.description: Positive spacing factor, larger => more space between nodes (N.B. n/a if causes overlap)
